comment: Example: How to add a new product to the landing page
instructions: Copy the product object below and add it to the 'products' array in landing-page/products.json

newProduct.name: AI Voice Cloning
newProduct.description: Clone any voice with just 10 seconds of audio using advanced AI voice synthesis

availableIcons: default - Generic icon for anything else
notes: 1. The 'id' must be unique and use kebab-case
2. The 'subdomain' will be used for production URLs (voice.leboube.ai)
3. The 'port' is used for local development (localhost:9500)
4. animationDelay should be 100ms * position (first=0, second=100, third=200, etc.)
5. Set 'enabled: false' to hide a product without deleting it
6. After editing products.json, just refresh your browser - no rebuild needed!
